name: The Game With No Checkpoints 4: Gloppy The Slime
name_original: The Game With No Checkpoints 4: Gloppy The Slime
description:
So, I just spent a bunch of my time making a game on GDevelop called, "The Game With No Checkpoints". It's kinda like the game "Getting Over It" but it's less harder lolololo

with slime

Also, make sure to ignore the fact that at the end of the game I accidently said Mr. Chomps returns instead of Mr. Croc returns.
